None.Name: Quake
None.Description: Triggers 5 abrasions that each deal 475 damage to structures in a 15m radius, up to 1400 in total. Deals only minimal damage to units. Knocks back small, medium and large units. Affects ground targets only. Reusable every 20 seconds.
